en.name: James Li
en.tagline: Senior Backend Engineer with Strong Infrastructure/SRE Capability.
summary: Solution-oriented engineer bridging technical implementation and business requirements.
Proven track record in leading projects from requirements gathering to production, delivering automation systems and SaaS platforms that reduce operational costs.
Proficient in Python/K8s/Azure with strong capability in system architecture design and cross-team collaboration.
Experienced in rapid prototyping and solution validation, with hands-on understanding of how AI accelerates both development workflows and business value creation.

degrees.title: M.S., Computer Science and Information Engineering
B.S., Computer Science and Information Engineering

children: Co-designed and developed a high-concurrency immersion cooling test infrastructure for global data centers, scaling the system to support **100k+** peak concurrent requests. Optimized system performance and database efficiency through **K8s Ingress/Load Balancers**, **Gunicorn worker tuning**, and database layer enhancements using **PgBouncer** and complex **query optimization**, ensuring **99.5%+** SLA.

Architected a high-concurrency data platform supporting **150k+** simultaneous tasks with **zero data loss**. Implemented a state-machine driven lifecycle management system that enables **near-zero RTO** (Recovery Time Objective), allowing automated state synchronization and seamless task resumption immediately after power or network failures. Optimized data retrieval latency from ~30 minutes to 1-2 seconds —a **99% reduction** in access time, while maintaining **99.5%+ SLA** and high availability across global data center operations.

Reduced K8s provisioning time **from hours to minutes** by architecting an automated package delivery system using Azure Front Door (CDN) and Blob Storage, effectively bypassing regional network constraints for internal apt repositories.

**Eliminated Single Point of Failure** (SPOF) and optimized the global deployment pipeline by migrating from self-hosted registries to Azure Container Registry (ACR). This strategic migration, combined with optimized caching and CI/CD workflows, reduced deployment cycles **from tens of minutes to mere seconds**, significantly accelerating the global delivery of critical services.

Standardized cross-region data workflows by designing an integrated Azure Blob Storage tool, **reducing data transfer latency from several minutes to just seconds**. Optimized the equilibrium between high-speed performance and cloud egress costs for international data centers, resulting in significantly improved operational efficiency and reduced infrastructure overhead.
Achieved a **99% improvement** in API response time by leading cross-team diagnostic initiatives; utilized database profiling to redesign index architectures and optimize complex query logic.
Eliminated API bottlenecks by implementing Kafka as an asynchronous messaging layer, transforming response times from 3 minutes to near real-time (**99%+ latency reduction**).

Minimized MTTR (Mean Time to Recovery) **from hours to minutes** by developing a unified abstraction layer for multi-vendor switch commands. This interface empowered on-site non-engineering personnel to execute complex network troubleshooting, reducing the dependency on senior engineering intervention and significantly improving SLA.

Empowered global operations through structured technical training and a unified command abstraction layer, achieving a **100%** autonomous resolution rate for routine infrastructure incidents. This initiative successfully eliminated the need for senior engineering escalation for common tasks, while simultaneously slashing MTTR **from hours to minutes**.

details.text: Developed image recognition system for automated end-to-end testing
children: Developed image recognition system for automated end-to-end testing simulating user behavior — established data collection and annotation system with standardized workflow to ensure training data quality, trained YOLO model using PyTorch for UI component detection and classification, deployed via Flask API achieving **95% accuracy** across multi-platform UI elements.

Developed chiller power optimization system — analyzed motor load patterns during cooling cycles, optimized motor frequency control strategy through machine learning to reduce energy consumption costs, developed web interface for multi-site deployment.
Managed Linux server infrastructure and PostgreSQL/MySQL databases ensuring stable operation of ML SaaS platform.

details.text: Established a DevOps and agile development culture
children: Led agile transformation initiative implementing Kanban workflow and GitLab CI/CD pipelines to improve team development efficiency.
Conducted hands-on Git workflow training.

zh.name: 李政勳
zh.tagline: 資深後端工程師 / 具備強大基礎架構與 SRE 能力
summary: 以解決方案為導向的工程師，擅長在技術實作與商業需求之間搭起橋樑。
具備從需求蒐集到正式上線的專案領導實績，成功交付自動化系統與 SaaS 平台，有效降低營運成本。
熟悉 Python/K8s/Azure，在系統架構設計與跨團隊協作方面具備強大能力。
擅長快速原型開發與解決方案驗證，並具備實務層面的 AI 理解，能加速開發流程並創造實際的商業價值。

details.text: 浸沒式冷卻基礎設施測試平台
children: 共同設計並開發高並發浸沒式冷卻測試基礎設施，為全球資料中心提供服務，將系統擴展至支援 **100k+** 峰值並發請求。透過 **K8s Ingress/Load Balancers**、**Gunicorn worker 調校**，以及使用 **PgBouncer** 和複雜的**查詢優化**進行資料庫層級增強，優化系統效能與資料庫效率，確保 **99.5%+** SLA。

details.text: 資料中心數據管理系統
children: 架構高並發資料平台，支援 **150k+** 同時進行的任務，達成**零資料遺失**。實作狀態機驅動的生命週期管理系統，實現**近零 RTO**（Recovery Time Objective），允許自動狀態同步，並在電力或網路故障後立即無縫恢復任務。將資料檢索延遲從約 30 分鐘優化至 1-2 秒 —— **99% 的存取時間縮減**，同時維持 **99.5%+ SLA** 及全球資料中心營運的高可用性。
透過使用 Azure Front Door（CDN）和 Blob Storage 架構自動化套件交付系統，有效繞過內部 apt 套件庫的區域網路限制，將 K8s 建置時間**從數小時縮短至數分鐘**。
**消除單點故障**（SPOF）並優化全球部署流程，從自行託管的 registry 遷移至 Azure Container Registry（ACR）。此策略性遷移結合優化的快取與 CI/CD 工作流程，將部署週期**從數十分鐘縮短至數秒**，顯著加速關鍵服務的全球交付。
透過設計整合的 Azure Blob Storage 工具標準化跨區域資料工作流程，**將資料傳輸延遲從數分鐘縮短至數秒**。優化國際資料中心高速效能與雲端出口成本之間的平衡，顯著改善營運效率並降低基礎設施開銷。

details.text: 高效能架構與系統優化
children: 透過領導跨團隊診斷工作，在 API 響應時間上達成 **99% 的改善**；運用資料庫分析重新設計索引架構並優化複雜查詢邏輯。
透過實作 Kafka 作為非同步訊息層，消除 API 瓶頸，將響應時間從 3 分鐘轉變為近乎即時（**99%+ 延遲降低**）。

details.text: 基礎設施自動化與營運效率
children: 透過開發多廠商交換器指令的統一抽象層，將 MTTR（平均恢復時間）**從數小時降低至數分鐘**。此介面賦能現場非工程人員執行複雜的網路故障排除，降低對資深工程師介入的依賴，顯著改善 SLA。
透過結構化技術培訓與統一指令抽象層賦能全球營運，對於例行基礎設施事件達成 **100%** 自主解決率。此計畫成功消除一般任務對資深工程師升級的需求，同時將 MTTR **從數小時大幅縮短至數分鐘**。

details.text: 用於端到端測試的影像辨識系統
children: 開發影像辨識系統用於自動化端到端測試，模擬使用者行為 — 建立資料搜集與標注系統，制定標準化工作流程確保訓練資料品質，使用 PyTorch 訓練 YOLO 模型進行 UI 元件偵測與分類，透過 Flask API 部署達成 **95% 準確率**，可識別跨平台 UI 元件。

details.text: 冰水主機用電最佳化系統
children: 開發冰水主機用電最佳化系統 — 分析冷卻過程中的馬達負載模式，透過機器學習技術優化馬達頻率控制策略降低能耗成本，開發 web 介面供多廠區部署使用。
負責 Linux 伺服器架設與維運、PostgreSQL/MySQL 資料庫管理，確保 ML SaaS 平台穩定運作

details.text: 建立 DevOps 與敏捷開發文化
children: 主導敏捷開發文化導入，建立看板系統與 GitLab CI/CD 流程，提升團隊開發效率
舉辦 Git 工作流程實務訓練
